title: Pixel 4a (andriod 11) APPALLING WiFi connection: connect/disconnect (other devices next are perfect)
content:
APPALLING WiFi : constant connect & disconnect
other devices along side are perfect
Now bought a wifi 'booster' and the Pixel now retains connection, thus proving the (much) reported connection issues with this handset are valid.
It clearly has an inherent 'weak' WiFi' reception.
Google only offer to swap for a refurbished replacement; NOT GOOD ENOUGH

4a Running the latest Android 11
